body: It is a 3ep story,  the chubby girl likes the good looking boy,  and the old dude put sleeping pills in her drinks,  and take a lot of pics for make her his sex toy.  kind makes me feels high,  it can be real if I can just make a useful plan,  and not like the comic,  I'm not going to leave any tracks.
Translation please! I dont care if i die, i would/will die eventually.
